Package org.codehaus.cargo.sample.java.validator

Interface Validator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfigurationCapabilityValidator, AbstractConfigurationFactoryValidator, AbstractContainerFactoryValidator, AbstractDeployerFactoryValidator, AbstractPackagerValidator, HasAuthenticationSupportValidator, HasBundleSupportValidator, HasDataSourceSupportValidator, HasDeployableSupportValidator, HasDirectoryPackagerValidator, HasEarSupportValidator, HasExistingConfigurationValidator, HasInstalledLocalContainerValidator, HasLocalDeployerValidator, HasPortOffsetValidator, HasRemoteContainerValidator, HasRemoteDeployerValidator, HasResourceSupportValidator, HasRuntimeConfigurationValidator, HasSpawnSupportValidator, HasStandaloneConfigurationValidator, HasWarSupportValidator, HasXAEmulationValidator, HasXASupportValidator, IsEmbeddedLocalContainerValidator, IsInstalledLocalContainerValidator, IsLocalContainerValidator, StartsWithContainerValidator, SupportsPropertyValidator
    public interface Validator
    Validate that a container.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean validate​(String containerId, ContainerType type)
      Validate if a container has a given configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        boolean validate​(String containerId,
                 ContainerType type)
        Validate if a container has a given configuration.
        Parameters:
        containerId - Container identifier.
        type - Container type.
        Returns:
        true if the given container supports the current validator, false otherwise.
